item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, March 28, 2025 at 3:35 AM UTC
item.description:
1. A decompilation and port of Sonic Advance 2-a GameBoy Advance game written in C (31 points | discuss)
2. Things I would have told myself before building an autorouter (64 points | 8 comments)
3. Apple needs a Snow Sequoia (408 points | 291 comments)
4. Tracing the thoughts of a large language model (611 points | 245 comments)
5. A note on the USB-to-PS/2 mouse adapter that came with Microsoft mouse devices (80 points | 13 comments)
6. Using uv and PEP 723 for Self-Contained Python Scripts (32 points | 8 comments)
7. How to Use Em Dashes (–), En Dashes (–), and Hyphens (-) (266 points | 201 comments)
8. Arctic sea ice sets a record low maximum in 2025 (45 points | 21 comments)
9. Learning Theory from First Principles [pdf] (93 points | 11 comments)
10. Most promoted and blocked domains on Kagi (180 points | 67 comments)
11. Helpcare AI (YC F24) Is Hiring ( | hide)
12. I genuinely don't understand why some people are still bullish about LLMs (232 points | 412 comments)
13. Launch HN: Continue (YC S23) – Create custom AI code assistants (148 points | 97 comments)
14. Yale professor who studies fascism fleeing US to work in Canada (20 points | 1 comment)
15. Piranesi's Perspective Trick (2019) (321 points | 72 comments)
16. Anti-Orbit Laser Submarines (2017) (22 points | 4 comments)
17. Blasting Past WebP - An analysis of the NSO BLASTPASS iMessage exploit (236 points | 97 comments)
18. Every Flop Counts: Scaling a 300B LLM Without Premium GPUs (8 points | 1 comment)
19. Emacs Solo: A Surprise System Crafters Live Demo (53 points | 2 comments)
20. The Unbearable Loudness of Chewing (31 points | 27 comments)
21. Golang on the Playstation 2 (44 points | discuss)
22. Asking good questions is harder than giving great answers (84 points | 11 comments)
23. Clean, a formal verification DSL for ZK circuits in Lean4 (61 points | 2 comments)
24. First-of-its-kind trial enables paralysed man to stand via stem cell injection (137 points | 25 comments)
25. Take this on-call rotation and shove it (131 points | 94 comments)
26. I tried making artificial sunlight at home (278 points | 153 comments)
27. What it takes to add a new back end to Futhark (11 points | discuss)
28. Better Shell History Search (20 points | 16 comments)
29. Dagger: A shell for the container age (152 points | 87 comments)
30. AI models miss disease in Black and female patients (267 points | 209 comments)
